title: Trio Smoothies
steps: Add banana, berries, yogurt and almond milk to a blender.
Sweeten with honey if desired and add ice.
Blend 30–45 seconds until creamy. Pour into glasses and garnish with mint.

title: Oyster-Sauce Stir-Fry Noodles
ingredients: Beef or chicken – 150 g, thinly sliced
steps: Boil noodles as per pack, drain and toss with a little sesame oil.
Stir-fry garlic and beef in a hot wok with neutral oil for 2–3 minutes.
Add noodles, oyster sauce and soy sauce; toss until glossy and coated.
Finish with spring onion and sesame seeds. Serve hot.

title: Crispy Quinoa Patties over Garden Salad
steps: Mix quinoa, egg, carrot, onion, breadcrumbs and spices. Form 6–8 small patties.
Pan-fry in olive oil 3–4 minutes per side until golden and crisp.
Toss salad leaves, tomatoes and cucumber with vinaigrette.
Serve patties over the salad. Squeeze extra lemon if desired.

title: No-Bake Lemon Cheesecake Slice
steps: Combine crushed biscuits with melted butter; press into a lined tin. Chill 10 minutes.
Beat cream cheese, sugar, vanilla and lemon zest until smooth; mix in lemon juice.
Fold in whipped cream gently; spread over the base. Chill at least 3 hours.
Slice and garnish with lemon peel and mint.
